item.title: OOM
item.description: 3.2 Understand the OutOfMemoryError Exception ç¿»è¯‘+ç†è§£ï¼š One common indication of a memory leak is the java.lang.OutOfMemoryError exception. Usually, this error is thrown when there is insufficient space to allocate an object in the Java heap.
